text: This user is looking for some suggestions around good templates/options when styling emails for outlook; if anyone has had any luck using specific elements/templates/designers in the past, it would be great to get those thoughts shared in one space for future use, and to help this user: <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/Content-Design-Questions/Suggestions-Good-email-templates-for-outlook/m-p/216013> Thanks in advance! :slightly_smiling_face:
looks like the email service they are using is actually pardot which is a beast of its own
I would point them to the trailblazer community of pardot honestly, they could help them more

things to possibly put in the suggestions:
What is it you are trying to do?
How are you trying to do it?
What result are you getting?
Can you show your code?
Can you link to the relevant page?
Screenshots, pictures, mockups, wireframes, are all helpful
Reminds me of stuff I've read about posting questions on stackoverflow: <https://stackoverflow.com/help/how-to-ask>
lol add a comment to it “If you just say something is broken and provide no other information, we are going to simply respond with ‘prove it’ and nothing else until you give us more information”
